publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-89 Bruce Crawford on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Office of the Clerkâ€”That the Parliament agrees that between 1 June 2007 and 31 August 2008, the Office of the Clerk will be open on all days except: Saturdays and Sundays, 30 November 2007, 24 December (pm), 25 and 26 December 2007, 1 and 2 January 2008, 21 and 24 March 2008, 5 May, 23 and 26 May 2008.
